Module BayesianClassifier
Package metrics

Class Measure

java.lang.Object
metrics.Measure
public class Measure
extends java.lang.Object
Class for the assessment metrics of the classifier: accuracy, specificity, sensitivity and F1score
Author:
Group 20

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Measure​(Dataset Cpredict, Dataset Ctest)
    Reads class values on predition data and test data and compares them.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double accuracy()
    Returns accuracy value
    double[] F1_score()
    Returns array of F1score values
    void print()
    Method to print metrics in the terminal according to the specified format
    double[] sensitivity()
    Returns array of sensitivity values
    double[] specificity()
    Returns array of specificity values

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Measure

      public Measure​(Dataset Cpredict, Dataset Ctest)
      Reads class values on predition data and test data and compares them. Calculates TP, TN, FP and FN based on the results. Calculates accuracy and runs the methods to calculate other metrics
      Parameters:
      Cpredict - Dataset with preditions
      Ctest - Dataset with test data

  • Method Details

    • accuracy

      public double accuracy()
      Returns accuracy value
      Returns:
      double accuracy value

    • specificity

      public double[] specificity()
      Returns array of specificity values
      Returns:
      double[] specificity values for each class and weighted average

    • sensitivity

      public double[] sensitivity()
      Returns array of sensitivity values
      Returns:
      double[] sensitivity values for each class and weighted average

    • F1_score

      public double[] F1_score()
      Returns array of F1score values
      Returns:
      double[] F1score values for each class and weighted average

    • print

      public void print()
      Method to print metrics in the terminal according to the specified format
